tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BatteryMetrics (
  device_id UUID,
  battery_level FLOAT,
  health_status VARCHAR,
  performance_metrics JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE battery_health_metrics (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  battery_level INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  cpu_usage FLOAT,
  memory_usage FLOAT,
  disk_usage FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE device_details (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  os_version VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE battery_health_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_serial_number VARCHAR(50),
    charge_level DECIMAL,
    temperature DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    cpu_usage DECIMAL,
    memory_usage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE location_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE alert_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE battery_health (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    health_status VARCHAR,
    capacity INTEGER,
    health_metrics JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE power_consumption (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    consumed_energy DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE temperature_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE charge_cycles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    cycle_number INTEGER,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE battery_alerts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    alert_type VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
